resources.string:
The original Milton Bradley Simon electronic game (icon: Wikimedia Commons) from the 1970s inspired this game.

After you click the Begin Game button, the computer will light one of the 4 colored tiles; click yours in turn and get a point. In each subsequent round, the computer will add one more random tile to the pattern. You get one more point for each tile you successfully press in the correct order.
The game ends when you press an incorrect tile.

Please wait until the computer has lighted the tiles in the pattern before you begin pressing them (otherwise you may not see the pattern you need to reproduce).
If checked, the board will be 3x2 buttons instead of 2x2 next time the app runs.
